metadata.title: CVE-2012-6709 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
ELinks 0.12 and Twibright Links 2.3 have Missing SSL CertificateValidation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

links - 2.8-1ubuntu1
links2 - 2.8-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: links2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8-1ubuntu1').
elinks: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
